Topic.Title: Quest crashing when accessing game scripts

Posts.EditableText: I've been working on the game scripts for a game and when I last saved, Quest crashed -- now I'm unable to open that tab without the program crashing. I've made a copy and I'm going to try and mess around with the copy to see if I can delete the game scripts to be able to access the tab, but has anyone else run into this/have tips?
Posts.HTML: I've been working on the game scripts for a game and when I last saved, Quest crashed -- now I'm unable to open that tab without the program crashing. I've made a copy and I'm going to try and mess around with the copy to see if I can delete the game scripts to be able to access the tab, but has anyone else run into this/have tips?

Posts.EditableText: JK, figured it out -- I was able to view the whole game in code view and take what I think was the issue out.
